name: Alpha Shooter
description:
Alpha Shooter will be enjoyed by Shoot em’ up genre fans like the Touhou Project series and Asteroids. While players will be occupied by the high score, tackle the challenge of claiming the top slot on the high score leaderboard.

Alpha Shooter will be a general audience title designed to contain no offensive or objectionable
material to any parent or child, and will receive an ESRB rating of ‘E’.
